ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Janko and welcome! Bards are quite useful - the people you disagreed with don t understand bards.  Even us bards need to learn lots of things to understand
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Janko and welcome!

Bards are quite useful - the people you disagreed with don't understand
bards. Even us bards need to learn lots of things to understand how to best
play our class. But right off the bat - you can buff them with chant of
battle and give everyone in the party more ability to attack and kill the
mobs you are fighting. Young level players who are new to the whole thing
do not yet under stand the importance of stats like str, dex, agi. Even as
we get older - we are constantly trying to balance and improves these stats.
Your songs do it magically.

You can give the whole party a great DEX boost with Chant of Battle - and if
they think a lev 5 bard is not needed in the melee combat - good then you
stand back and use your drum and chant of battle and give them even better
buff. If there are monks in the group they will be amazed and love you.

Go off and kill gnolls and stuff and get level 6 for your heal song and then
they will be singing a different tune and you will be playing it <g>

Welcome again and keep us posted on how you are doing,

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 24th song
Selling Swords and Such
somewhere on Innoruuk
